sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO EMP ( empno , ename , deptno ) VALUES ( #empno# , #ename# , #deptno# )

SELECT empno , ename , NVL(job, '') "JOB" , NVL(mgr, 0) "MGR" , hiredate , NVL(sal, 0) "SAL" , NVL(comm, 0) "COMM" , deptno FROM EMP WHERE empno = #empno#
